data.title: Hotel St. Nicholas
data.meta_description: Hotel St. Nicholas offers accommodations in Cripple Creek, Colorado. Make your reservation with us today.
data.text:
What do you do with a historic 1890's hospital, overlooking Cripple Creek and the surrounding mountains, and just a short walk from casinos, attractions, and fine food?

You create a hotel that displays the rich character of the turn of the century and adds modern amenities that make lodging there a true pleasure.

The Hotel St. Nicholas, named for the gold rush-era hospital that once occupied the same building, offers a blend of fascinating history and gracious accommodations in a charming Cripple Creek boutique hotel.

What do you do with a historic 1890's hospital, overlooking Cripple Creek and the surrounding mountains, and just a short walk from casinos, attractions, and fine food?

You create a hotel that displays the rich character of the turn of the century and adds modern amenities that make lodging there a true pleasure.

The Hotel St. Nicholas, named for the gold rush-era hospital that once occupied the same building, offers a blend of fascinating history and gracious accommodations in a charming Cripple Creek bed and breakfast inn.

These rooms offer the most space with special extras like an attached sitting porch, balcony, and room to accompany an additional roll-away bed. Note: every room is different! We suggest looking at each one to see what you would prefer.

These rooms offer king & queen beds, with on-suite bathrooms. All the regular standard amenities you want like internet at a nice price. Note: every room is different! We suggest looking at each one to see what you would prefer.

If you're looking for a lower cost option, these rooms are furnished with queen beds and standard amenities, but your private bathroom may be across the hall. Note: every room is different! We suggest looking at each one to see what you would prefer.

We have one classic guest room with two full sized beds (room 11), if that's the layout you're looking for. All the standard amenities + ensuite bathroom. Note: every room is different! We suggest looking at each one to see what you would prefer.
